location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Muskat, to James Charles Edwards, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Pelly's intention to depart Muskat for Sohar and advising Edwards not to send any reports or telegraphs to Government that relate to the Wahabee [Wahhabi] Ameer [Amir Faisal ibn Turki] or the Sultan of Muskat [Thuwaini bin Said] as there are many rumours circulating and Pelly wishes to confirm and validate them first.
